content: वरणं [वृ-ल्युट् ल्यु वा] {@--1@} Choosing, selecting. {@--2@} Begging, soliciting, requesting. {@--3@} Surrounding, encircling. {@--4@} Covering, screening, protecting. {@--5@} The choice of a bride. {@--6@} Worshipping (of priests &c.). {@--7@} Keeping off, prohibiting, warding. --णः {@--1@} A rampart, surrounding wall. {@--2@} A bridge. {@--3@} The tree called Varuṇa. {@--4@} A tree in general; इह सिंधवश्च वरणावरणाः करिणां मुदे सनलदानलदाः <ls>Ki. 5. 25.</ls> {@--5@} A camel. {@--6@} A kind of ornament on a bow {@--7@} <ab>N.</ab> of Indra.
